transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with torah restoration ministries
websites ww spirit and tour com this is
tour rule number 42 tour rule number 42
which you can find in Leviticus 19 19
you shall keep my statutes you shall not
let your cattle gender with diverse
kinds you shall not sow your fee filled
with mingled seed so if you're a farmer
or you have livestock obviously this
only applies to those of you who are
farmers or in the agricultural business
or you have a garden make sure you do
not put different types of seeds and
mingle them together in the same place
do not mingle different types of
livestock together this is sin and
iniquity don't do it you better follow
this tutorial number 42 all you farmers
and agricultural base people or you're
not going to make it to the safe place
and you will go to the lake of fire this
is a commandment not an option this is
to our rule number 42 daniel lee here
filming at psu shalom
